basic_info.name: Facts and Figures of Sri Eshwar Reddy College Of Law, Tirupati
Why to Join Sri Eshwar Reddy College of Law, Tirupati

Experienced Advocates visits- Experience holder professional advocates are invited on regular visit as guest faculties to teach procedural laws and practical subjects to give the students an exposure which increased the intellectual abilities of the students.

Moot Court Hall-The College has its Moot Court Hall where students can give sufficient time to their practice as a lawyer and share their live experience while learning important aspects of law education.

Best Faculty-The College has best and well trained faculty members who committed academicians with teaching experience and participation in various orientation courses, refresher’s courses, seminars at the all level whether it is regional, state or national level to groom up the educational skills of the students.

Section.name: About Sri Eshwar Reddy College of Law
Section.description:
Sri Eshwar Reddy College of Law, Tirupati aims to produce advocates who would take up profession with devotion and commitment and enable the students to handle the new challenges of legal profession in the globalized world. It has created and maintained an academic atmosphere that enables a student’s growth to the full extent. This college envisions giving outstanding educational services to all the people without any discrimination as to expand the intellect of individual and reminding law students their responsibilities as social engineers and also to equip the graduates of law to be efficient in their domain and thereby contribute for the upliftment of justice and integrity in society.
